short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Comment Section of the Internet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CHATTERBOX creates a comment section for every webpage on the internet. 

stay connected everywhere you go, discuss, give feedback, anonymous, and report untrustworthy websites as you surf.

what's new:
- Reply to comments 🙊
- Dark/Light theme 🌃
- Upload custom images 🖼
- Disabled YouTube commenting 🦽
- Report sketchy websites 🤨
- And more 🎨

Future updates: 
- Reply Notifications 🗣
- Link to google/FB account 🧙‍♂️
- And more +

Keep the chatter alive!
